tit.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。

sen.j: 伊根町営バス（いねちょうえいバス）は、京都府与謝郡伊根町で運行しているコミュニティバス。
sen.e: Ine Town Bus is a community bus operated in Ine Cho, Yosa Gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ine Town Bus is a community bus operated in Ine Town, Yosa-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 地名の表記訂正しました。
sen.e: Ine Town Bus is a community bus operated in Ine Town, Yosa-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 通常は「伊根バス」と略される。
sen.e: It is normally called "Ine Bus".
It is normally called 'Ine Bus.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。
sen.e: It is normally called 'Ine Bus.'

sen.j: 丹後海陸交通（丹海バス）に運行委託している。
sen.e: The operation is entrusted to Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co.,Ltd. (Tankai Bus).
The operation is entrusted to Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd. (Tankai Bus).
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。スペース補足しました。
sen.e: The operation is entrusted to Tango Kairiku Kotsu Co., Ltd. (Tankai Bus).

sen.j: 2004年4月1日から運行を開始した。
sen.e: The operation has started since April 1, 2004.
The operation has started since April 1, 2004.
The operation has started since April 1, 2004.
Summary
Summary
Summary
The fare is between 150 and 300 yen.
The fare is between 150 and 300 yen.
The fare is between 150 and 300 yen.

sen.j: 運行日は系統によって異なり、月～金曜日運行、土曜日運行、登校日運行、冬期運休などがある。
sen.e: The operated days differ for bus service routes, such as between Monday and Friday, on Saturdays, on school days, not running in wintertime, etc.
The operated days differ for bus service routes, such as between Monday and Friday, on Saturdays, on school days, not running in wintertime, etc.
The operated days differ for bus service routes, such as between Monday and Friday, on Saturdays, on school days, not running in wintertime, etc.

sen.j: 長延本庄線と畑谷本庄線の全線、及び本庄筒川線と筒川伊根線の一部については、乗車前日までに丹海バスへの予約が必要（丹海バス：0772-42-0321）。
sen.e: For all the routes of Choen-Honjo and Hatadani-Honjo and some of Honjo-Tsutsukawa and Tsutsukawa-Ine, a reservation to Tankai Bus is required by the day before (Tankai Bus: 0772-42-0321).
For all the routes of Choen-Honjo and Hatadani-Honjo and some of Honjo-Tsutsukawa and Tsutsukawa-Ine, a reservation to Tankai Bus is required by the day before (Tankai Bus: 0772-42-0321).
For all the routes of Choen-Honjo and Hatadani-Honjo and some of Honjo-Tsutsukawa and Tsutsukawa-Ine, a reservation to Tankai Bus is required by the day before (Tankai Bus: 0772-42-0321).

sen.e: Honjo-Tsutsukawa route: Jiryo - Honjo Clinic (operation partly upon reservation)

Honjo-Tsutsukawa route: Jiryo - Honjo Clinic (operation partly upon reservation)

sen.j: 筒川伊根線 寺領（野村）～伊根診療所 （一部予約運行）
sen.e: Tsutsukawa-Ine route: Jiryo (Nomura) - Ine Clinic (operation partly upon reservation)
Tsutsukawa-Ine route: Jiryo (Nomura) - Ine Clinic (operation partly upon reservation)
Tsutsukawa-Ine route: Jiryo (Nomura) - Ine Clinic (operation partly upon reservation)
